name: Death Clock
description:
Death Clock: A game where you have to die to progress

This game was made during the Wowie Jam 3.0, with the theme being "Failure is progress - let's mess with the idea of winning and losing".

In this game you constantly switch from being green to red. Dying when you are red gets you to the next stage, but dying when you are green does nothing. Try and survive in this endless bullet hell, or advance stages to multiply your points. It's up to you!
